GKNO-ALL-PIPELINES.description: Print all available pipelines to screen.

GKNO-ALL-TOOLS.description: Print all available tools to screen.

GKNO-DNL.description: Do not log this run of gkno.

GKNO-DO-NOT-EXECUTE.description: Flag to stop execution of the Makefile after gkno is run.

GKNO-DRAW-PIPELINE.description: Name of the file to output a visual depiction of the pipeline graph.

GKNO-EXPORT-PARAMETER-SET.description: Export a parameter set to a configuration file of this name.

GKNO-INPUT-PATH.description: Path for input files if not defined.  Default: current directory.

GKNO-PARAMETER-SET.description: Generate a stdout and stderr for each task.

GKNO-LOOP.description: Loop over a subsection of the pipeline.

GKNO-MAKEFILE-ID.description: Append this text to all makefiles generated in this execution of gkno.

GKNO-MULTIPLE-MAKEFILES.description: If any of the arguments are supplied with a list of values causing one or more tools to require multiple iterations, if this is set to true, multiple makefiles are generated. If set to false [default], a single makefile will be generated.

GKNO-MULTIPLE-RUNS.description: Run the pipeline multiple times using the inputs defined in this file.

GKNO-JOBS.description: The number of parallel jobs to be used (only valid in conjunction with the --internal-loop option).

GKNO-NO-HARD-WARNINGS.description: If not set, some warnings require the user to acknowledge that they have read it by pressing 'Enter'.

GKNO-OUTPUT-PATH.description: Path for output files if not defined.  Default: current directory.

GKNO-TASK-STDOUT.description: Generate a stdout and stderr for each task.

GKNO-TIMING.description: Generate timing information for all tasks.

GKNO-TIMING-ADVANCED.description: Generate extended timing information for all tasks.

GKNO-VERBOSE.description: Flag to determine if verbose information should be output.  Default is not verbose.

GKNO-WRITE-INCOMPLETE.description: List all of the makefiles that have not yet been completed successfully.
